name: Just Three Words - A Free and Fun Word Game for the Holidays and Christmas
name_original: Just Three Words - A Free and Fun Word Game for the Holidays and Christmas
description:
Ho! Ho! Ho! The holidays are here! There are holiday movies and Christmas music. When you look around, you see holiday decorations. Why not play holiday games as well? Just Three Words: Holiday Edition is sure to bring you into the holiday spirit.

Can you guess the correct answer with just three clues? Just Three Words: Holiday Edition is a festive word game that will cause you to feel MERRY, JOYFUL, and may even make you CHEER! This colorful, festive app has a brilliantly designed background screen. Watch as animated gold coins cascade from the top of the screen, when you guess the correct answer. Game features include sound effects, easy to use menu button and the option to get more coins.

Download Just Three Words: Holiday Edition today and get into the holiday GAME spirit!
